title: My Portfolio
description: Created this github page to showcase my resume

title: Industrial Training Portal
description: [FINAL YEAR PROJECT] An intelligent automated training portal for university internship assignment .

title: Pera Hockey Match Scheduler
description: A web application to generate match schedules avoiding conflicts in multiple courts, allowing intermediate idle times.

title: ACES Hackathon 2017 Scores
description: A collaborative realtime web app, for judges to allocate scores at final presentations. Hosted locally during the event.

title: Realtime NodeJS Starter
description: A starter template for realtime express app, with Socket.io and MongoDB

title: Published vue-photo-upload
description: Published a Vue.js plugin to npm, a component to handle photo uploads + minimal editing (scaling + cropping).

title: Published vue-live-edit
description: Published a Vue.js plugin to npm, to toggle editing mode & viewing mode for text fields

title: Innovators LED Cube Simulator
description: A LED cube simulator and the judge control panel for the LED cube challenge at 'Innovators 2017', in university of Peradeniya

title: Serial Data Visualization Server
description: A boilerplate project template I created to retrieve serial data and visualize them in a web interface

title: MyStay.lk
description: [STARTUP PROJECT] A website to search and locate places for a long-term or short-term stay.

title: Realtime Multiplayer Game
description: A realtime 2D-shooter-game. Handles over 80,000 concurrent requests at 100 requests per second over WebSockets.

title: Industrial Training Portal 2016
description: A web platform for university training assignment process, which was actively used in 2016.

title: Perabeats Live
description: A live scoreboard for perabeats, to show live scores at SLUG 2K16

title: IoT Hub
description: [ACADEMIC PROJECT] An IOT Hub, to enable authorization, authentication, communication and data analysis for any custom IOT device given the configurations.

title: Stock Auction Server
description: [ACADEMIC PROJECT] A client server model for an auction scenario (a case on a bidding on stocks) created in Java/JavaFX

title: Fractals GUI
description: [ACADEMIC PROJECT] A minimal GUI to render the fractal series for Mandelbrot and Julia Sets, implemented in Java
